history.proof: intro H. apply IE with (A0 := psi1 --> psi2 :: A) (phi := psi1) (psi := psi2). - apply Ctx. apply in_eq. - auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
b: falsity_flag
psi2: form
psi1: form
A: list form

Goal:
(psi1 --> psi2 :: A) ⊢I psi1 -> (psi1 --> psi2 :: A) ⊢I psi2

Premises:
Inductive True : Prop := I : True
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
appCtx : forall b (psi1 psi2 : form) (A : list form), In (psi1 --> psi2) A -> A ⊢I psi1 -> A ⊢I psi2
II : forall (A0 : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A0) ⊢ psi -> A0 ⊢ (phi --> psi) where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
IE : forall (A0 : list form) (phi psi : form), A0 ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> A0 ⊢ phi -> A0 ⊢ psi where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
incl_tl : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), incl l m -> incl l (a :: m)
prv_ind : forall P : forall ff : falsity_flag, peirce -> list form -> form -> Prop, (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A) ⊢ psi -> P ff p (phi :: A) psi -> P ff p A (phi --> psi)) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> P ff p A (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> P ff p A phi -> P ff p A psi) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A ⊢ phi -> P ff p (map (subst_form ↑) A) phi -> P ff p A (∀ phi)) ->...-> P ff p l f6
prv_sind : forall P : forall ff : falsity_flag, peirce -> list form -> form -> SProp, (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), (phi :: A) ⊢ psi -> P ff p (phi :: A) psi -> P ff p A (phi --> psi)) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi psi : form), A ⊢ (phi --> psi) -> P ff p A (phi --> psi) -> A ⊢ phi -> P ff p A phi -> P ff p A psi) -> (forall (ff : falsity_flag) (p : peirce) (A : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A ⊢ phi -> P ff p (map (subst_form ↑) A) phi -> P ff p A (∀ phi)) ->...-> P ff p l f6
in_eq : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a (a :: l)
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n where ?A : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type] ?B : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type]
incl_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l m : list A), In a m -> incl l m -> incl (a :: l) m
Init.pr2 : forall s : Init.sigma ?B, ?B (Init.pr1 s) where ?A : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type] ?B : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- ?A -> Type]
DepElim.solution_left : forall t : ?A, ?B t -> forall x : ?A, x = t -> ?B x where ?A : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type] ?B : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- ?A -> Type]
DepElim.eq_simplification_sigma1_dep : forall (p q : ?A) (x : ?P p) (y : ?P q), (forall e : p = q, eq_rect p ?P x q e = y -> ?B) -> Init.sigmaI ?P p x = Init.sigmaI ?P q y -> ?B where ?A : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type] ?P : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- ?A -> Type] ?B : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type]
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P [] -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)) -> forall l : list A, P l
Init.sigmaI : forall (B : ?A -> Type) (pr1 : ?A), B pr1 -> Init.sigma B where ?A : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type]
Ctx : forall (A0 : list form) (phi : form), In phi A0 -> A0 ⊢ phi where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
Exp : forall (A0 : list form) (phi : form), A0 ⊢ falsity -> A0 ⊢ phi where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
Weak : forall (A0 B : list form) (phi : form), A0 ⊢ phi -> incl A0 B -> B ⊢ phi where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
Kripke.ksoundness : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢I phi -> Kripke.kvalid_ctx A phi
soundness : forall (A : list form) (phi : form), A ⊢I phi -> valid_ctx A phi
AllI : forall (A0 : list form) (phi : form), map (subst_form ↑) A0 ⊢ phi -> A0 ⊢ (∀ phi) where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
AllE : forall (A0 : list form) (t : term) (phi : form), A0 ⊢ (∀ phi) -> A0 ⊢ phi[t..] where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]
der_sing : forall (P : stack ?X) (x y : list ?X), In (x, y) P -> derivable P x y where ?X : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- Type]
soundness' : forall phi : form, [] ⊢I phi -> valid phi
Kripke.ksoundness' : forall phi : form, [] ⊢I phi -> Kripke.kvalid phi
impl_prv : forall (A0 B : list form) (phi : form), (rev B ++ A0) ⊢ phi -> A0 ⊢ (B ==> phi) where ?p : [b : falsity_flag psi1 : form psi2 : form A : list form |- peirce]

```coq
intro H.
apply IE with (A0 := psi1 --> psi2 :: A) (phi := psi1) (psi := psi2).
- apply Ctx. apply in_eq.
- assumption.
Qed.
```
